vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
ὁλοκαύτ-ωμα, ατος, τό,
burnt-offering, [LXX+1st c.AD+]
vocabInfos.shortDef: burnt offering, wholly consumed on the altar as dedicated to God
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
burnt offering, wholly consumed on the altar as dedicated to God
a holocaust, whole burnt-offering, Mk. 12:33; Heb. 10:6, 8*
vocabInfos._es_Definition: holocausto, ofrenda de animales incinerados en el altar
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition: 整隻焚燒的祭, 燔祭
vocabInfos._zh_Definition: 整只焚烧的祭, 燔祭
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: của lễ thiêu; tế lễ thiêu
